sub_fields.label: With Excerpt
sub_fields.name: excerpt
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide post excerpt in post items

sub_fields.label: With Button
sub_fields.name: with_button
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide link to article in post items

sub_fields.label: As Banner
sub_fields.name: as_banner
sub_fields.instructions:
Show Post items as banner style.
"As List" must be unchecked!

sub_fields.label: As List
sub_fields.name: as_list
sub_fields.instructions:
Show Post items list style.
"As Banner" must be unchecked!

sub_fields.label: As Banner First
sub_fields.name: as_banner_first
sub_fields.instructions:
Show first Post items as banner style.
Use it when is set all to be "As Banner" or "As list".

sub_fields.label: Number of Posts to Show in Grid
sub_fields.name: num

sub_fields.label: Image Size
sub_fields.name: image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Siezes can be set here Media Settings

sub_fields.label: No lazy load
sub_fields.name: data_no_lazy
sub_fields.instructions: Stop lazyload for post items if they are visible on first screen

sub_fields.label: Custom Classes for Post Items
sub_fields.name: class
sub_fields.instructions:
Here you can set custom Post items classes.
Example: col-12 col-md-6 col-lg-3
As silder must be empty, only margin classes.

sub_fields.label: Filter by
sub_fields.name: filter_by
sub_fields.instructions: Choose how to filter Post Items. By Category Name (category_slug) or By Comma Separated ids of Posts

sub_fields.label: Get Posts from Category
sub_fields.name: category_name
sub_fields.instructions:
Add Category slug (one or more "comma separated" ) to display only from selected categories. 
Leave blank to show from all.

sub_fields.label: Get Posts by IDs
sub_fields.name: post_ids
sub_fields.instructions: Add ids of Posts "comma separated" to display them.

sub_fields.label: Row Gutter Between Post Items
sub_fields.name: row_gutter
sub_fields.instructions:
Adjust vertical gutter spacing between post items to equalize them.. Examples: gy-1, gy-2, gy-3, gy-4, gy-5.
For responsive vertical gutters in diferent devices use: "-sm, -md, -lg, -xl". Example: gy-lg-4

sub_fields.name: as_slider

sub_fields.instructions: Paste video url here

sub_fields.message:
Use video url or video embed.
If you use "video url", video will be displayed in pop up, otherwise it will be in the content as iframe.

sub_fields.label: Card
sub_fields.name: card
sub_fields.instructions: Use to create Card

sub_fields.label: Card: Country
sub_fields.name: countries
sub_fields.instructions: Use key letters to navigate in the list

choices.south_georgia_and_south_sandwich_islands: South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands

sub_fields.label: Card: button title
sub_fields.name: button_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom title attribute different than auto generated based on button title

sub_fields.label: Card: Custom class
sub_fields.name: item_custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: Set custom class for current card item.

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Orientation
sub_fields.name: card_effect_orientation
sub_fields.instructions: Specifies the distance to translate the animated element along the X, Y & Z axis when scrolling arrives at the the to position.

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Position Offset
sub_fields.name: card_effect_position_offset
sub_fields.instructions: Set offset how many pixels will be movement of card. Use negative value for left to right, and positive value from right to left.

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Scale
sub_fields.name: card_effect_scale
sub_fields.instructions: Specifies the scale of the animated element (optionally along the X, Y & Z axis) when scrolling arrives at the the to position.

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Scale Factor
sub_fields.name: card_effect_scale_factor
sub_fields.instructions:
Value: 0 – 5
1 is default with no scale factor

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Rotate
sub_fields.name: card_effect_rotate
sub_fields.instructions: Specifies the angle of rotation of the animated element along the X, Y & Z axis when scrolling arrives at the the to position.

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Rotate Angle
sub_fields.name: card_effect_rotate_angle
sub_fields.instructions: Value: angle of rotation in degrees

sub_fields.label: Card: Effect Start Position Opacity
sub_fields.name: card_effect_start_position_opacity
sub_fields.instructions:
Specifies the opacity of the animated element when scrolling arrives at the the to position.
Value: 0 – 1

sub_fields.label: Layout: cards title custom classes
sub_fields.name: title_class
sub_fields.instructions:
Useful to change font size on cards titles
exaples: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, display-1, display-2, display-3, display-4

sub_fields.label: Layout: row gutter between card items
sub_fields.name: row_gutter
sub_fields.instructions:
Adjust horizontal or vertical gutter spacing between card items. Examples: g-0, gx-0, gy-0, g-1, gx-1, gy-1, g-2, gx-2, gy-2, g-3, gx-3, gy-3, g-4, gx-4, gy-4, g-5, gx-5, gy-5.
For responsive gutters in diferent devices use: "-sm, -md, -lg, -xl". Example: gx-lg-4

sub_fields.label: Card item: vertical offset
sub_fields.name: vertical_offset
sub_fields.instructions:
Adjust vertical spacing between card items. Values are in"rem".
To use row gutter vertical offset, card item value must be set as "Use row gutter instead".

sub_fields.label: Card item: responsive vertical offset
sub_fields.name: responsive_margins
sub_fields.instructions:
Add margins classes for different devices.
Examples:  For responsive margins in diferent devices use: "-sm, -md, -lg, -xl". Example: mt-3 mt-lg-5

sub_fields.label: Layout: Use responsive margins
sub_fields.name: use_responsive
sub_fields.instructions: Useful when is needed to add responsive margins as classes for different devices

sub_fields.label: Layout: card item column width
sub_fields.name: column
sub_fields.instructions: Card Items per row

sub_fields.label: Card item: card body custom classes
sub_fields.name: card_body
sub_fields.instructions: Add classes if needed to offset global card body paddings. Examples: "p-0" if padding is no needed.

sub_fields.label: Layout: cards link as Group Content
sub_fields.name: link_content
sub_fields.instructions: Useful when link wrap card content, not as button.

sub_fields.label: Layout: cards image full
sub_fields.name: cards_full
sub_fields.instructions: If is checked to true. Image will not follow card's padding

sub_fields.label: Layout: break card item on mobile (image first)
sub_fields.name: break_item
sub_fields.instructions: Useful when Image is before content on mobile devices (not on top)

sub_fields.label: Layout: heading title custom classes
sub_fields.name: heading_title_class
sub_fields.instructions:
Useful to change font size on Heading Title instead of default section title font size.
Exaples: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, display-1, display-2, display-3, display-4

sub_fields.label: Layout: description before Card items
sub_fields.name: description_first
sub_fields.instructions: If is checked, description will be before Card items. If not, description will be after them.

sub_fields.label: Layout: invert content colors
sub_fields.name: invert_content
sub_fields.instructions: Useful when content background color is dark

sub_fields.name: background_image

sub_fields.instructions: Make background with parallax effect

sub_fields.instructions: If is checked to true. Check also if "Scroll effects" is set to true from ACF Theme Settings.

sub_fields.instructions:

sub_fields.instructions: ID of Global Modal Item. Use to trigger it.

sub_fields.label: Activate Modal
sub_fields.name: modal_active
sub_fields.instructions: Use to hide or show temporary global modal

fields.label: LazyLoad on images
fields.name: lazyload
fields.instructions:
Lazy loading is a strategy to identify resources as non-blocking (non-critical) and load these only when needed. It's a way to shorten the length of the critical rendering path, which translates into reduced page load times.
For static images in content areas use calss: "lazy" and "data-src" instead of "src"
For background images use: data-bg="path to file"

fields.label: Soft scroll on pages
fields.name: softscroll
fields.instructions: Add soft scroll on pages

fields.label: 3D Parallax Hover Effect
fields.name: parallax_hover
fields.instructions:
Add parallax hover effect on images.
Works on content with image block layout.

fields.label: Double Image Effects
fields.name: double_image
fields.instructions: Add double image effect on global cta

fields.label: Scroll Effects
fields.name: scroll_me
fields.instructions: Add scroll effects on Card elements

fields.label: Touch Swipe
fields.name: touchSwipe
fields.instructions: Add touch swipe effect on bootstrap sliders. Hero slider and testimonial slider

fields.label: GSAP LIbrary and Other Related on it
fields.name: gsap
fields.instructions: GSAP allows you to effortlessly animate anything JS can touch. Delivering silky-smooth performance and unmatched support so you can focus on the fun stuff.

fields.label: Animation in Scroll View
fields.name: in_vew_animation
fields.instructions: Add animation on elements in section when they are visible using "animate css".

fields.label: Typewriter Effect on Page Title
fields.name: typewriter
fields.instructions: Affects also other elements in page heading like paragraphs and buttons

fields.label: Activate Slick Slider
fields.name: slick_slider
fields.instructions: Activate it to use slick slider in pages

fields.label: Add slug on pages (comma separated), where to use slick slider.
fields.name: slick_slider_on_pages
fields.instructions: With adding slug on pages website is SEO optimized and don't used on pages where is not needed.

fields.label: Choose pages where to use slick slider.
fields.name: page_select
fields.instructions: With current selected pages, website is SEO optimized and Sliders are not used on pages where is not needed.

choices.492: Partner with HKS for Simple, Fast, and Secure solutions.
choices.490: Accelerate Your Business Growth with HKS

fields.label: Main image
fields.name: main_image
fields.instructions: Use Image for archive pages. Image will be displayed with full size.

fields.label: Secondary image
fields.name: secondary_image
fields.instructions:
Image for category or tag grid in block layout builder.
Use shortcode : [parent_category_list] or [parent_tag_list tag=""] (tag="tag_slug" to filter it.).
Also for [subcategories child_of="term_id"]. "term_id" must be category archive page id.

fields.label: custom css
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Write custom css here only for current page.

fields.label: custom scripts
fields.name: custom_scripts
fields.instructions: Write custom scripts here only for current page. Wrap it in tag script.

fields.label: Footer: change footer style
fields.name: footer_style
fields.instructions: Select one of premade footer layouts
